name: Terere
description: Tereré or tererê is a typical South American drink made with the infusion of yerba mate in cold water.  Of Guarani origin, it can be consumed with lemon, mint, among others.
directions: Put 1 liter of cold water in a thermos, the juice of the lemon juice packet, the juice of the 4 lemons, sugar and stir.
Serve in the bowl with the herb.
